price: Rasûle düşen (vazife,) ancak (kendisine indirileni) tebliğ etmektir. Allah, sizin açığa vurduğunuzu da, gizlediğinizi de bilir.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
